comments:
I20060215-0010

Just found this in the log. I was switching between project-specific and workspace settings for the compiler. When I turned on project-specifiec settings, I changed nothing, pressed apply, there was the rebuild, I pressed OK during the rebuild. Seems not always reproducible.
